QuestData.Title: Building an Army
QuestData.Description: We must keep our eyes on the future. There will come a time when we will need an army.$b$bWe've proven that the withered are not completely beyond redemption. They can be taught, and molded.$b$bI want you to be their combat trainer, $n. Come with me. We can use the nearby ruins as an arena to hone their abilities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thalyssra when you are ready to lead the withered in their first combat training mission.
QuestData.RewardText: The withered have been assembled and are ready for their training.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Thalyssra to start training your withered
